originalText.text:
Carolyn Iocolono is the most fantastic medical professional I have ever had.
She is amazing. So caring and understanding yet professional and precise makes you feel like you’re the most important person in the world.

text.text:
Carolyn Iocolono is the most fantastic medical professional I have ever had.
She is amazing. So caring and understanding yet professional and precise makes you feel like you’re the most important person in the world.

originalText.text:
As an elementary school teacher during covid, finding myself under an overwhelming amount of stress, it was a telehealth call with Nurse Practitioner Iocolano that quelled the anxious moments I was enduring. Her appreciated bed side manners, patience, and excellent listening skills were fundamental to my speedy recovery and essential to my teaching challenge during the pandemic.

Recently, I had a visit with her for a physical, where I thanked Nurse Practitioner Iocolano for her care during that time. I was welcomed as if we were acquainted for many a years, and the time she dedicated to again, listening, brought comfort to my time in the examination room. By far, she is an incredible medical practitioner, and as important a good individual. Thank you Nurse Practitioner Iocolano.

originalText.text: Carolyn Iocolano is nothing short of amazing. She is warm, she cares she is available. I adore her and fly from all over the globe to come see her for my annual physicals. She is that good.

text.text: Carolyn Iocolano is nothing short of amazing. She is warm, she cares she is available. I adore her and fly from all over the globe to come see her for my annual physicals. She is that good.

originalText.text: Mrs locolano is caring ,compassionate and listening to me as a patient, she trouble shoots and figures out what's the best medical treatment for me ,wonderful person I even recommended my husband to see her

text.text: Mrs locolano is caring ,compassionate and listening to me as a patient, she trouble shoots and figures out what's the best medical treatment for me ,wonderful person I even recommended my husband to see her

originalText.text: Nurse Iocolano is a wonderful provider, I’ve been going to her ever since I moved to NYC for both my PCP and GYN needs, for at least 8 years. I’ve recommended numerous friends to her who have also had really positive experiences. She’s very nice and takes the time to get to know you and discuss your concerns. I really trust her and feel lucky to have found a provider that I’ve built a positive and trusting relationship with.
